title: God Punishes Man for Blasphemy? Well, Images are Unrelated
subtitle: Fact Check: An image on social media is being shared with a claim that karma has punished a man as he burnt the Quran and that the hands of the man started burning on their own. The claim is misleading as the two images are unrelated.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The image at the top, where a man can be seen on a hospital bed, is of Paul Gaylord, an Oregon man who contracted a rare case of the plague trying to take a mouse from the jaws of a choking cat, reported The Guardian.

According to a report by Oregon Live, Gaylord was hospitalised in critical condition with plague in June 2012.
